CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Prototype Development stage positioned above or below the Final Design Approval stage?
SRP.A: The Prototype Development stage is positioned {above} the Final Design Approval stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Final Design Approval?
VE.A: The value of stage Final Design Approval is {25%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Testing and Validation?
VE.A: The value of stage Testing and Validation is {31%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Design Phase, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Final Design Approval, with a value of {25%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Prototype Development to stage Testing and Validation?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Prototype Development to stage Testing and Validation is {21%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Testing and Validation to stage Final Design Approval is {6%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Design Phase to stage Prototype Development?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Design Phase to stage Prototype Development is {48%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 28%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Design Phase} stage has {100%}, the {Prototype Development} stage has {52%}, the {Testing and Validation} stage has {31%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 28%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 28% and 76%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prototype Development} stage has {52%}, the {Testing and Validation} stage has {31%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Design Phase to Prototype Development, or from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Design Phase} to {Prototype Development} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval, or from stage Prototype Development to Testing and Validation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prototype Development} to {Testing and Validation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval, from stage Prototype Development to Testing and Validation, or from stage Design Phase to Prototype Development?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Design Phase} to stage {Prototype Development} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Design Phase} and {Prototype Development} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Testing and Validation} and {Final Design Approval} stages.
